Experience Senior Global Product Lead - Mobile Call Advertising Google July 2014  – Present (1 year 2 months) Greater New York City Area I lead the strategy and business execution of our Mobile calls products, globally. Global Lead, Social Sales and Strategy Google January 2012  –  November 2013  (1 year 11 months) Greater New York City Area As a Global Lead, I was a chief advocate for Google+ and responsible for the overall go-to-market strategy of social and search. Summary Sohail Singh is a long time Googler who has worked on shaping the evolution of Google’s products as a product specialist involved in multiple product areas. Sohail has years of experience in launching both Hardware & Software products in the Asia pacific region and was involved in the early days of multiple product areas. In his current position at Google, Singapore he works on launching Google hardware products across the Asia pacific region which includes but is not limited to Nexus Phones, chromebooks and chromecast. Sohail is a geek who loves technology and is very passionate about the possibilities that the internet creates.  
 
He has delivered invited guest lecturers at various business schools on digital marketing and the ways by which the internet is impacting how we work, communicate and live.

Summary I currently work at Google as a product specialist for Google News.  
 
I started out at Google 5 years ago in ad sales. After 2.5 years launching and managing ad campaigns, I developed a strong understanding and appreciation for how the web is monetized. Next, I worked on two of our news products, Google News & Google Play Newsstand, focusing on educating publishers on our products and handling sensitive content policy issues. Recently, I've moved to a product specialist role for Google News, influencing product direction, coordinating launch operations, and leading various efforts to improve index quality.

Summary Joined Google in 2006 coming from a Document Management Start-up where an individual had to wear multiple hats. Being a long time Googler, I had the privilege to see and participate actively in its fast growth. My initial focus was to scale our consumer support, process improvements, productivity measurement tools and business development activities. Back then, I was involved with consumer Gmail and Google Accounts as a product specialist (Usability, tech support, communications, reporting etc). Later on, I joined the Google Enterprise team (in its early days) as a Sales Engineer and managed the Sales Engineering team in EMEA. Currently I head up the Google For Work Post Sales Teams in NACE.
